verbs.description: [ARG1: Giants defensive end / linebacker Olivier Vernon] [V: was] [ARG2: one of the NFL players who took a knee last season during the Star Spangled Banner in protest of police brutality and social injustice , which drew the ire of President Donald Trump] .

Giants defensive end / linebacker Olivier Vernon was one of [ARG0: the NFL players] [R-ARG0: who] [V: took] [ARG1: a knee] [ARGM-TMP: last season] [ARGM-TMP: during the Star Spangled Banner] [ARGM-PNC: in protest of police brutality and social injustice , which drew the ire of President Donald Trump] .

Giants defensive end / linebacker Olivier Vernon was one of the NFL players who took a knee last season during the Star Spangled Banner in [ARG0: protest of police brutality and social injustice] , [R-ARG0: which] [V: drew] [ARG1: the ire of President Donald Trump] .
